data: It is wonderful what improvements have taken place in clocks and watches during the last half-century; how accurately the escapements are constructed, how delicately the springs are formed, how easily the wheels move, and what good time they keep.
The Smuggler: A Tale. Volumes I-III
G. P. R. (George Payne Rainsford) James
